text:
Blinds.com | Senior Front End Developer | Houston | ONSITE

www.blinds.com

We are looking for an experienced Senior Front-End Developer who is ready to take a leap into unknown waters. The Senior Front-End Developer designs, develops, enhances and tests front-end web and hybrid mobile applications using HTML, CSS, Javascript and frameworks, such as React, Angular/Angular2, Cordova and Ionic, to deliver innovative, responsive, customer-friendly experiences across multiple form factors and devices. The Senior Front-End Developer is passionate about enhancing the user experience and has a proven ability to deliver web and hybrid mobile applications that solve real-world business problems.

Full details http://about.blinds.com/careers/?p=job%2FoqlQ4fwp
